data.text: RT @Fans_A380: Beautiful capture! #A380 of @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/9ufvlNpNKs
@xirclebox Thanks for the kind compliments! :)
@ElliottMB Welcome aboard! We can't wait to have you try out our new aircraft, as well! :)
Spring has sprung! http://t.co/hnjgqEitCq
@JCMarkus Thanks for coming on board with us, Jeremy! :) Glad you enjoyed your meal
@skyler_jf Thanks for choosing us. We hope you enjoy your  flight with Asiana! :)
@Airline_Alex Following!
@alexphoto12 Hello Alex. You may inquire at our London sales office here: 44-845-602-9900
@ZachHonig Yes, it is. Please be sure to share with us your experience on it!
@ZachHonig Yes! 28 May is confirmed for the A380 as of right now.
@ZachHonig Following! How can we help you?
@BLGranucci Thanks for understanding, Benjamin!
@pmcg @Fans_A380 @BLGranucci Guess we worded it incorrectly. We know this photo is LAX, but we meant we're excited to see the A380 in NYC!
We're excited to see #planespotters snapshot this aircraft in NYC! http://t.co/YN4DkgUMQJ #A380 (Thanks for sharing @Fans_A380)
@KenBoogles Yes, we are updating our website so it is temporarily down. Thanks for the updates!
@BaconGuRoux Thanks for flying with us and congrats!
RT @BOACLtd: B747-4F @AsianaAirlines at @IncheonAirport1 Photo by Alan Kenny #avgeek #b747 http://t.co/n3gJ97EOaE http://t.co/njCQUHQe3P
@tooves You may contact our sales office in Sydney at 1300-767-234 to request and confirm.
@tooves Hello Nick, generally we offer layover hotels for SYD-ICN-LHR flights, but there may be some restrictions.
As the Spring season is fast approaching, we're looking forward to warmer weather! What are your favorite cities to visit in the Spring?
3 of 6 of our US gateways! RT @nytimestravel: Day cruises that show off the best of Chicago, San Francisco and NY. http://t.co/dAwywkvhHx
Get lucky this #FridayThe13th and book early bird specials on the new #ASIANA380 from JFK! http://t.co/p2Bo7TDc6q http://t.co/4aVr2MaxQY
@HotelBravo07 Wow! So beautiful. Thanks for sharing this photo! :)
Want to know what it's like to be on #FirstClass? Here's a great photo review we've found: http://t.co/6QndnhM4M2
East Coast! Use our early bird specials to Asia & reserve your seat on the new #ASIANA380 from #JFK today! http://t.co/8JCnnj34vX
@Em_Hands Hello Emma, we apologize for any inconvenience. Your inquiry has been brought to our CR Team's attention once more. Thank you.
@fredneust You'll have to check with @OpodoGermany to make any changes, since you booked it through them.
@orgler The mileage accumulation rates vary by carrier and the frequent flyer program. For more info: http://t.co/H7XDHj9h7F
@yamnedboh1260 Thanks! :)
@orgler Hello Johannes! You may use our VOC form to submit inquiries regarding mileage here: http://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ
Follow us on #Pinterest for more #travel inspiration! http://t.co/6sVBFNItZG

RT @akoeni: @AsianaAirlines @IncheonAirport1 thanks Asiana. Nice lounge as always.  Like the sushi! http://t.co/HKwMvdzJp2
It's #DreamFareTuesday! Head over now for dreamy fares to select Asiana destinations! http://t.co/IN2uahhZcm http://t.co/uDsgiUsUhO
@jaseridesbikes Yes, that would be acceptable. Thank you!
@jaseridesbikes The 6-month rule applies to Korean citizens in Korea.
@jaseridesbikes Hello- if you are a US resident, marriage certificate or your child's birth certificate will suffice.
Banpo bridge, Seoul, South Korea http://t.co/dpr9avCJRL
Jinhae-gu, South Korea. http://t.co/zKhgfZO0X4

@toria1121 Please feel free to write to us on your recent experience -- it will definitely help us to improve: http://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ
@toria1121 Hello there. Thanks for the feedback, and we regret the lack of service provided over the phone...
@j_e_recer Hope you enjoyed your flight with us on OZ201!
New York -- we're excited to bring the #ASIANA380 to you! Click to view routes it'll operate: http://t.co/DiSbJcl0O0 http://t.co/y8YfgvhTCe
@againsthesunx That's the beauty of @StarAlliance!
@SouthlandBrad Hello! Here's a list of In-Flight Entertainment: http://t.co/2uCw67EmG2 Thank you!
We sure do miss having our Queen #B747 with us on the LAX route! http://t.co/17vKvK6TbV Thanks for the photo @BOACLtd
@godwyn26 Hi Godwyn, please DM us your name, Asiana Club account number and address so we could look into this. Thank you!
@jaseridesbikes Hello! You may set up a Family Mileage Plan. Here's how: http://t.co/zxBIS3dPuV

Less than 3 hours left of #DreamFareTuesday! http://t.co/IN2uahhZcm http://t.co/yXEhJAUDgm

@achanman1 Thanks for the birthday wishes and photo! What a throwback... :)

@Mheartstar Hello! Please let us know if you have any questions!
@Airbus_380_Fans Happy Lunar New Year to you, as well! Hope you have a wonderful year~!
@MikeFO_737 This is a beautiful shot, Michael! Thanks for sharing!
Happy Lunar New Year! May the year of the Goat bring all the best to you and yours! http://t.co/6RAkWCcA27
@IATA Thank you! :) We appreciate it very much!
@Frangoyo Thank you, Franco!
@logisticsearch Thank you Vanessa! :)
@HND_fly_ATC Thank you so much!
@miaerolinea Thank you!
@Zackkk_Attackkk Happy birthday to you, too, Zach! :) Hope you have a good one!
Thank you! :) RT @Airbus Happy Birthday Asiana! Best wishes from your friends at Airbus http://t.co/FWcoCGxUFP
@Airbus Amazing! We still love this photo very much. Thank you for the well wishes!
@SupplyChainD Thank you very much!
@no__musicnolife Thank you! :)
ASIANA is celebrating our 27th birthday today! Thanks to all for your support thus far! Here's to many more years~! http://t.co/SJmmUKa7KI
Happy Valentine's Day! Sending out love to all of our fans... Share with us photos of your… http://t.co/IejE6RMzyH
@VictorEGuevara We'll need to look into this. Use the link to send us details & the appropriate team will assist you: http://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ
@VictorEGuevara Please let us know if you have further questions. Thank you!
@VictorEGuevara Hi Victor. Miles earned depends on booking class of ticket purchased. Take a look here: http://t.co/eZ9qEfi3CR
@stateofwndrlust Apologies for the inconvenience. Would you mind sending us feedback to our CR team? Link here: http://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ

@ScenesfromSeatt Welcome aboard!
@Miguechan79 We'll be looking forward to have you on board!

@asamae2kn Thanks for sharing photos with us! They're beautiful.
@WilsonJoshuaLee Hi Josh. At the moment, we do not offer wi-fi on our LAX-ICN routes. Thank you!
@JustRobertR Hope you have a wonderful time on our flight! :)
Happy Friday! What are your travel plans? RT @Fans_A380 HL-7625 #A380 @AsianaAirlines arriving at @flyLAXairport http://t.co/j5HmapH06o
@WilsonJoshuaLee Hi Josh, you may contact our reservation center at 800-227-4262 to select seats, since it was booked thru UA mileage.
Got someone special you love? Tell us why and we'll send them a sweet gift! #ValentinesDay http://t.co/CJO5O1Arx4

The #ASIANA380 is taking a bite of The Big Apple soon! 🎶🎵 🗽 "New York~~ concrete jungle where… http://t.co/FVzoWFUH9Y
@cielendles Hello. Please DM us your inquiry. Thank you!
Don't miss out: we have special fares to Asia on our #ASIANA380! Isn't it time you took that vacation? More: http://t.co/Of0dQp73uV #A380
What a beauty! Have you experienced the #ASIANA380? RT @Fans_A380 Beautiful shot #A380 @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/gaqylkRho3
@MartinChiffers Hello Martin! Good to have you on board again!
@plutekplutek0 Hello, your name must match exactly as it appears on your passport. We suggest you contact the point of purchase to amend it.
@FarEastMiles Thanks for the tip. We'll be sure to switch it up next time!
Happy #TravelTuesday! RT @Fans_A380 #A380 @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/FHmMgxBFIH
